Articles.Content:
For whatever reason, i can't use any in flight menu controls. I can't revert flights, quit to main menu, save/load or even return to the space center, i can only resume game, log posted below. 

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fu6IxL2HXY8JmbwWxjS_dJ53y_8MmSgp/view?usp=sharing 

 

Edit: removing Flight manager for reusable stages seems to have done the trick

Edited June 1, 2021 by lookolookthefox
solved
